Thursday 03.04.08

  • Setting has a single-race intent, removed alternate races and placed statement of this single-race intent on Races page. Darker Dreams 21:20, 3 April 2008 (CEST)

Thursday 13.03.08

  • Added Books to Setting and removed the redirection to Book (also placed on the top, links between those pages).
  • Added Cooking Books to Books and created a recipe: Oily Stinger

Lordbug 13:47, 13 March 2008 (CET)

Saturday 08.03.08

  • Added a Magic and Technology section to the Quz'nad page
  • Created a basic character profile for the Governor of Nehlya: Philip Dionisius
  • Added an information table to the side of Nehlya and to Philip Dionisius (Simpler to find quick data. Maybe all Cities, Areas and Characters should have one?)

Lordbug 03:02, 8 March 2008 (CET)

  • Added leaders for each of the Quz'nadi Factions

Lordbug 14:49, 8 March 2008 (CET)

Wednesday 05.03.08

  • Improved Nehlya's Organization section and added a sketch for the Trade District.

Lordbug 17:44, 5 March 2008 (CET)


Tuesday 04.03.08

  • Added Independent Cities under Misc Groups & Factions.
  • Added a new independent city: Nehlya (being developed by Lordbug and his group).

Lordbug 23:23, 4 March 2008 (CET)


Wednesday 16.01.08

  • Added Religions to Setting, began work on Religions

Monday 17.12.07

  • Changed world-map from the single-continent map to a (really lousy) multi-continent map in anticipation of making setting changes to match. Hoping one of the art people will have mercy and create something better. Darker Dreams 08:52, 17 December 2007 (CET)

Sunday 16.12.07

  • Fixed some stuff from "Lurker in the Dark"
  • Additions and fixes to politics

Jekkar 13:11, 16 December 2007 (CET)

Thursday 13.12.07

  • seperating Game Mechanics from Setting

Thursday 13.12.07

  • Replaced Combat system.
  • Provided method for skill/ability checks, filled in information for several skills, reduced skill lists to remove redundency and attempt to provide clarity.
  • Seperated Character, Skills, Abilities, and Progression into seperate pages.

Darker Dreams 17:21, 13 December 2007 (CET)

Monday 10/12/2007

- Major restructuring of several portions, beginning usage of templates for navigation, cleanups of various other aspects and made the death information more robust.

Friday 07/12/2007

- Added new poem to poem collection. ( Induane )

Thursday 06/12/2007

- Minor typo fixes and restructuring in the story Juni ( Induane )

Wednesday 07/11/2007

- Started editing Housing system ( Bbkiller )

- Minor edit in Settings developer guide ( BBkiller )
